def_cn: （英国）维多利亚（女王）时代的
def_en: Victorian means belonging to, connected with, or typical of Britain in the middle and last parts of the 19th century, when Victoria was Queen.

def_cn: （尤指对良好行为的评判标准和道德观）有维多利亚时代特点的，传统的
def_en: You can use Victorian to describe people who have old-fashioned attitudes, especially about good behaviour and morals.

def_cn: （英国）维多利亚(女王）时代的人
def_en: The Victorians were the British people who lived in the time of Queen Victoria.
